trans-unit.source: Provides a simple way to create and manage the contents of connection strings used by the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma maneira simple de criar e gerenciar o conteúdo de cadeias de caracteres de conexão usadas pelo <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Esse tipo foi substituído e será removido em uma versão futura do .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Oracle e ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The connection string builders allow developers to programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and to parse and rebuild existing connection strings, using properties and methods of the class.
trans-unit.target: Os construtores de cadeia de caracteres de conexão permitem que os desenvolvedores criem programaticamente sintaticamente corrigir cadeias de caracteres de conexão e analisar e recriar a conexão existente cadeias de caracteres, usando as propriedades e métodos da classe.

trans-unit.source: The connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known key/value pairs allowed by Oracle.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de cadeia de caracteres de conexão fornece propriedades com rigidez de tipos correspondentes para os pares chave/valor conhecido permitidos pela Oracle.

trans-unit.source: The OracleConnectionStringBuilder class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
trans-unit.target: A classe implementa OracleConnectionStringBuilder o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: This means that the class works with Visual Studio .NET designers at design time.
trans-unit.target: Isso significa que a classe funciona com os designers do Visual Studio .NET em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: When developers use the designer to build strongly typed **DataSets** and strongly typed connections within Visual Studio .NET, the strongly typed connection string builder class will display the properties associated with its type and will also have converters that can map common values for known keys.
trans-unit.target: Quando os desenvolvedores de usam o designer para criar fortemente tipado **conjuntos de dados** e fortemente tipadas conexões no Visual Studio .NET, a classe de construtor de cadeia de caracteres de conexão fortemente tipados exibirá as propriedades associadas ao seu tipo serão também ter conversores que podem ser mapeados para os valores comuns conhecida chaves.

trans-unit.source: Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the OracleConnectionStringBuilder class to build and modify connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores que precisam criar cadeias de caracteres de conexão como parte dos aplicativos podem usar a classe OracleConnectionStringBuilder para criar e modificar cadeias de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The OracleConnectionStringBuilder class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: A classe OracleConnectionStringBuilder também torna fácil de gerenciar cadeias de caracteres de conexão armazenadas em um arquivo de configuração do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The OracleConnectionStringBuilder performs checks for valid key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: O OracleConnectionStringBuilder executa verificações de pares chave/valor válido.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this class cannot be used to create invalid connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, essa classe não pode ser usada para criar cadeias de caracteres de conexão inválido.

trans-unit.source: Trying to add invalid pairs will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Tentando adicionar pares inválidos lançará uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: The OracleConnectionStringBuilder class maintains a fixed collection of synonyms, and when required, can perform the required translation to convert from a synonym to the corresponding well-known key name.
trans-unit.target: A classe OracleConnectionStringBuilder mantém um conjunto fixo de sinônimos e, quando necessário, pode executar a conversão necessária para converter de um sinônimo para o nome de chave conhecido correspondente.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property to retrieve a value, you can specify a string that contains any synonym for the key you need.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando você usa o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>propriedade para recuperar um valor, você pode especificar uma cadeia de caracteres que contém qualquer sinônimo para a chave é necessário.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property for a full list of acceptable synonyms.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>propriedade para obter uma lista completa de sinônimos aceitáveis.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OracleConnectionStringBuilder handles attempts to insert malicious entries.
trans-unit.target: O OracleConnectionStringBuilder manipula as tentativas de inserir entradas mal-intencionado.

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code, using the default <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property (the indexer, in C#) correctly escapes the nested key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o código a seguir, usando o padrão <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>propriedade (o indexador, em c#) corretamente ignora o par chave/valor aninhado.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim builder As New System.Data. _ OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder builder("Data Source") = "OracleDemo" builder("Integrated Security") = True builder("User ID") = "Mary;NewValue=Bad" System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString) ``` [C#] ``` System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Data Source"] = "OracleDemo"; builder["integrated Security"] = true; builder["User ID"] = "Mary;NewValue=Bad"; System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString); ``` The result is the following connection string that handles the invalid value in a safe manner by enclosing the User ID value in quotes: ``` Data Source=OracleDemo;Integrated Security=True;User ID="Mary;NewValue=Bad" ```
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim builder As New System.Data. _ OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder builder("Data Source") = "OracleDemo" builder("Integrated Security") = True builder("User ID") = "Mary;NewValue=Bad" System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString) ``` [C#] ``` System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Data Source"] = "OracleDemo"; builder["integrated Security"] = true; builder["User ID"] = "Mary;NewValue=Bad"; System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString); ``` o resultado é a seguinte cadeia de conexão que trata o valor inválido de maneira segura, colocando o valor da ID de usuário entre aspas:``` Data Source=OracleDemo;Integrated Security=True;User ID="Mary;NewValue=Bad" ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The provided connection string provides the data for the instance's internal connection information.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres de conexão fornecido fornece os dados para obter informações de conexão interna da instância.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> class provides a fixed internal collection of key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>classe fornece uma coleção interna fixa de pares chave/valor.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Even if you supply only a small subset of the possible connection string values in the constructor, the object always provides default values for each key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo se você fornecer apenas um pequeno subconjunto dos valores de cadeia de caracteres de conexão possíveis no construtor, o objeto sempre fornece valores padrão para cada par chave/valor.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property of the object is retrieved, the string contains only key/value pairs in which the value is different from the default value for the item.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ConnectionString%2A>propriedade do objeto for recuperada, a cadeia de caracteres contém apenas os pares chave/valor no qual o valor é diferente do valor padrão para o item.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The basis for the object's internal connection information.
trans-unit.target: A base de informações de conexão interna do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Parsed into name/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: Analisado em pares de nome/valor.

trans-unit.source: Invalid key names raise a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException>.
trans-unit.target: Nomes de chave inválidos geram <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException>.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException>

trans-unit.source: Invalid key name within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Nome de chave inválido na cadeia de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: Invalid value within the connection string (specifically, when a Boolean or numeric value was expected but not supplied).
trans-unit.target: Valor inválido na cadeia de caracteres de conexão (especificamente, quando um valor numérico ou booleano era esperado, mas não fornecido).

trans-unit.source: Clears the contents of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Limpa o conteúdo do <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The Clear method removes all key/value pairs from the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>, and resets all corresponding properties.
trans-unit.target: O método Clear remove todos os pares chave/valor da <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>e redefine todas as propriedades correspondentes.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This includes resetting the connection string to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Isso inclui a redefinir a cadeia de caracteres de conexão para uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> contains a specific key.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> contém uma chave específica.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> contains a fixed-size collection of key/value pairs, the ContainsKey method determines only if a particular key name is valid.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>contém uma coleção de tamanho fixo de pares chave/valor, o ContainsKey método determina apenas se um determinado nome da chave é válido.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A chave a ser localizado no <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> contains an element that has the specified key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> contém um elemento que foi especificado chave; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: keyword is null ( in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: keywordé nulo ( no Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the Oracle data source to connect to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome da fonte de dados Oracle para se conectar ao.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Data Source" and "Server" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade corresponde às chaves "Fonte de dados" e "Server" na cadeia de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: Regardless of which of these values has been supplied within the supplied connection string, the connection string created by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> will use the well-known "Data Source" key.
trans-unit.target: Independentemente de qual desses valores foram fornecido na cadeia de caracteres de conexão fornecido, a cadeia de caracteres de conexão criadas pelo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>usará a chave "Fonte de dados" conhecida.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the DataSource property is reset.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor passado é nulo quando você tentar definir a propriedade, a propriedade de fonte de dados será redefinida.

trans-unit.source: If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor não foi definido e o desenvolvedor tenta recuperar a propriedade, o valor de retorno é <xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: The value of the DataSource property, or <xref:System.String> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade de fonte de dados, ou <xref:System.String>se nenhum foi fornecido.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the pooler automatically enlists the connection in the creation thread's current transaction context.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o pooler inscreve automaticamente a conexão no contexto de transação atual do thread de criação.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Enlist" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade corresponde à chave "Enlist" na cadeia de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Enlist property, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property has not been previously set.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade Enlist, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se a propriedade não foi definida anteriormente.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether "User ID" and "Password" are specified in the connection (when <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>) or whether the current Windows account credentials are used for authentication (when <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o "ID" e "Senha" são especificadas na conexão (quando <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>) ou se as credenciais de conta do Windows atuais são usadas para autenticação (quando <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>).

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Integrated Security" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade corresponde à chave de "Segurança integrada" na cadeia de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The value of the IntegratedSecurity property, or a <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade IntegratedSecurity, ou um <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se nenhum foi fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> tem um tamanho fixo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in every case, because the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> supplies a fixed-size collection of key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>em cada caso, porque o <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> fornece uma coleção de tamanho fixo de pares chave/valor.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor associado com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer.
trans-unit.target: No c#, essa propriedade é o indexador.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> contains a fixed-size dictionary, trying to add a key that does not exist within the dictionary throws a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException>.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>contém um dicionário de tamanho fixo, tentar adicionar uma chave que não existe no dicionário lança <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException>.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists all the possible keys within the connection string, and the default value for each.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista todas as chaves possíveis dentro a cadeia de caracteres de conexão e o valor padrão para cada um.

trans-unit.source: |Key|Property|Default value| |---------|--------------|-------------------| |Data Source (or server)|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource%2A>|Empty string| |Persist Security Info (or persistsecurityinfo)|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.PersistSecurityInfo%2A>|False| |Integrated Security|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity%2A>|False| |User ID (or user or uid)|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.UserID%2A>|Empty string| |Password|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Password%2A>|Empty string| |Enlist|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Enlist%2A>|True| |Pooling|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Pooling%2A>|True| |Min Pool Size|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.MinPoolSize%2A>|0| |Max Pool Size|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.MaxPoolSize%2A>|100| |Omit Oracle Connection Name|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.OmitOracleConnectionName%2A>|False| |Unicode|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Unicode%2A>|False| |Load Balance Timeout (or connection lifetime)|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.LoadBalanceTimeout%2A>|0|
trans-unit.target: | Chave | Propriedade | Valor padrão | |---------|--------------|-------------------| | Fonte de dados (ou servidor) | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource%2A>| Cadeia de caracteres vazia | | Manter informações de segurança (ou persistsecurityinfo) | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.PersistSecurityInfo%2A>| False | | Segurança integrada | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity%2A>| False | | ID de usuário (ou usuário ou uid) | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.UserID%2A>| Cadeia de caracteres vazia | | Senha | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Password%2A>| Cadeia de caracteres vazia | | Inscrever-se | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Enlist%2A>| True | | Pool | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Pooling%2A>| True | | Tamanho mínimo do Pool | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.MinPoolSize%2A>|0| | Tamanho máximo do Pool | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.MaxPoolSize%2A>|&100; | | Omitir o nome de Conexão do Oracle | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.OmitOracleConnectionName%2A>| False | | Unicode | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Unicode%2A>| False | | Carregar saldo ou tempo limite (tempo de vida da conexão) | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.LoadBalanceTimeout%2A>|0|</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.LoadBalanceTimeout%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Unicode%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.OmitOracleConnectionName%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.MaxPoolSize%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.MinPoolSize%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Pooling%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Enlist%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Password%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.UserID%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.PersistSecurityInfo%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to get or set.
trans-unit.target: A chave do item a ser obtido ou definido.

trans-unit.source: The value associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: O valor associado com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: keyword is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keywordé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Tried to add a key which does not exist within the available keys.
trans-unit.target: Tentativa de adicionar uma chave que não existe nas chaves disponíveis.

trans-unit.source: Invalid value within the connection string (specifically, when a Boolean or numeric value was expected but not supplied).
trans-unit.target: Valor inválido na cadeia de caracteres de conexão (especificamente, quando um valor numérico ou booleano era esperado, mas não fornecido).

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the keys in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>que contém as chaves de <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A ordem dos valores no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>não for especificado, mas é a mesma ordem que os valores associados no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>retornado pelo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the keys in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>que contém as chaves de <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum time, in seconds, for the connection to live in the connection pool before it is removed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tempo mínimo, em segundos, para a conexão de vida do pool de conexão antes de ser removido.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Load Balance Timeout" and "Connection Lifetime" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade corresponde às chaves "Timeout de balanceamento de carga" e "Tempo de vida de Conexão" na cadeia de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The value of the LoadBalanceTimeout property, or 0 if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade LoadBalanceTimeout ou 0 se nenhum foi fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of connections allowed in the connection pool for this specific connection string.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número máximo de conexões permitidas no pool de conexão para essa cadeia de caracteres de conexão específica.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Max Pool Size" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade corresponde à chave de "Max Pool Size" na cadeia de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The value of the MaxPoolSize property, or 100 if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade MaxPoolSize ou 100 se nenhum foi fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum number of connections allowed in the connection pool for this specific connection string.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número mínimo de conexões permitidas no pool de conexão para essa cadeia de caracteres de conexão específica.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Min Pool Size" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade corresponde à chave de "Tamanho mínimo do Pool" na cadeia de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The value of the MinPoolSize property, or 0 if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade MinPoolSize ou 0 se nenhum foi fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flag that enables transaction rollbacks on earlier versions of Oracle (prior to 8.1.7.4.1).
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o sinalizador que habilita reversões de transação em versões anteriores do Oracle (antes 8.1.7.4.1).

trans-unit.source: When set to `true`, this property prevents certain errors from occurring when attempting to roll back transactions in earlier versions of Oracle (prior to 8.1.7.4.1).
trans-unit.target: Quando definido como `true`, essa propriedade impede que determinados erros que ocorrem durante a tentativa de reverter transações em versões anteriores do Oracle (antes 8.1.7.4.1).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if transaction rollbacks are enabled; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se reversões de transação estão habilitados; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the password for the Oracle account.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a senha para a conta do Oracle.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Password" and "pwd" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade corresponde às chaves "Senha" e "pwd" na cadeia de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Password property, or <xref:System.String> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade de senha, ou <xref:System.String>se nenhum foi fornecido.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates if security-sensitive information, such as the password, is not returned as part of the connection if the connection is open or has ever been in an open state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor booliano que indica se as informações confidenciais, como a senha, não são retornadas como parte da conexão se a conexão for aberta ou já tiver estado aberta.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Persist Security Info" and "persistsecurityinfo" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade corresponde às chaves "Persist Security Info" e "persistsecurityinfo" na cadeia de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The value of the PersistSecurityInfo property, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade PersistSecurityInfo, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se nenhum foi fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the connection will be pooled, or whether each connection will be explicitly opened every time that the connection is requested.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor booliano que indica se a conexão será agrupado, ou se cada conexão poderá ser explicitamente aberto toda vez que a conexão é solicitada.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Pooling" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade corresponde à chave do "Pool" na cadeia de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Pooling property, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""></xref>if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade de pool, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""> </xref>se nenhum foi fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Removes the entry with the specified key from the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Remove a entrada com a chave especificada do <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Because the Remove method returns a value that indicates its success, it is not necessary to look for the existence of a key before trying to remove the key/value pair from the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> instance.
trans-unit.target: Como o método Remove retorna um valor que indica o sucesso, não é necessário procurar a existência de uma chave antes de tentar remover o par chave/valor da <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>instância.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> maintains a fixed-size collection of key/value pairs, calling the Remove method just resets the value of the key/value pair back to its default value.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>mantém uma coleção de tamanho fixo de pares chave/valor, chamando o método Remove apenas redefine o valor do par chave/valor de volta para seu valor padrão.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Because the collection of keys supported by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> is fixed, every item within the collection has a known default value.
trans-unit.target: Porque a coleção de chaves com suporte a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>é fixa, cada item dentro da coleção tem um valor de padrão conhecido.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the keys, and the value for each when the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> is first initialized, or after the Remove method has been called: |Key|Default value| |---------|-------------------| |Data Source|Empty string| |Persist Security Info|False| |Integrated Security|False| |User ID|Empty string| |Password|Empty string| |Enlist|True| |Pooling|True| |Min Pool Size|0| |Max Pool Size|100| |Unicode|False| |Load Balance Timeout|0| |Omit Oracle Connection Name|False|
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista as chaves e o valor para cada quando o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>é inicializado pela primeira vez ou depois que o método Remove foi chamado: | Chave | Valor padrão | |---------|-------------------| | Fonte de dados | Cadeia de caracteres vazia | | Persistência de segurança | False | | Segurança integrada | False | | ID de usuário | Cadeia de caracteres vazia | | Senha | Cadeia de caracteres vazia | | Inscrever-se | True | | Pool | True | | Tamanho mínimo do Pool |&0; | | Tamanho máximo do Pool |&100; | | Unicode | False | | Tempo limite de balanceamento de carga |&0; | | Omitir o nome de Conexão do Oracle | False |</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The key of the key/value pair to be removed from the connection string in this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A chave do par chave/valor a ser removido da cadeia de conexão neste <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key existed within the connection string and was removed, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the key did not exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave existe na cadeia de caracteres de conexão e foi removida, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a chave não existe.

trans-unit.source: keyword is null ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keywordé nulo ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified key exists in this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a chave especificada existe na <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: This method behaves identically to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse método se comporta de forma idêntica ao <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A>método.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A chave a ser localizado no <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> contains an entry with the specified key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> contém uma entrada com a chave; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um valor correspondente para a chave fornecida neste <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The TryGetValue method lets developers safely retrieve a value from an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> without needing to verify that the supplied key name is a valid key name.
trans-unit.target: O método TryGetValue permite que os desenvolvedores recuperar com segurança um valor de um <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>sem a necessidade de verificar se o nome de chave fornecido é um nome de chave válido.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Because TryGetValue gracefully handles searching for a non-existent key, there is no need to look for the existence of a key before retrieving its value.
trans-unit.target: Como TryGetValue normalmente manipula pesquisando uma chave inexistente, não é necessário para procurar a existência de uma chave antes de recuperar seu valor.

trans-unit.source: Calling TryGetValue with a nonexistent key will place the value null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Chamando TryGetValue com uma chave inexistente colocará o valor null (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) no `value` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A chave do item a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: The value corresponding to `keyword.`
trans-unit.target: O valor correspondente a`keyword.`

trans-unit.source: if keyword was found within the connection string; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se keyword foi encontrada na cadeia de caracteres de conexão; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates if the client supports the Unicode functionality available in later Oracle clients, or if it is non-Unicode aware.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor booliano que indica se o cliente oferece suporte à funcionalidade Unicode disponível em clientes do Oracle posteriores, ou se for não Unicode com suporte.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Unicode" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade corresponde à chave "Unicode" na cadeia de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Unicode property, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false " name="false " href=""></xref>if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade Unicode, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_false " name="false " href=""> </xref>se nenhum foi fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user ID to be used when connecting to Oracle.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a ID de usuário a ser usado ao conectar-se ao Oracle.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "User ID", "user", and "uid" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade corresponde às chaves "User ID", "usuário" e "uid" na cadeia de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the UserID property is reset.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor passado é nulo quando você tentar definir a propriedade, a propriedade UserID é redefinida.

trans-unit.source: If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor não foi definido e o desenvolvedor tenta recuperar a propriedade, o valor de retorno é <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The value of the UserID property, or <xref:System.String> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade ID do usuário, ou <xref:System.String>se nenhum foi fornecido.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the values in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>que contém os valores de <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated keys in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A ordem dos valores no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>não for especificado, mas é a mesma ordem que as chaves associadas no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>retornado pelo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Because each instance of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> always contains the same fixed set of keys, the Values property always returns the values corresponding to the fixed set of keys, in the same order as the keys.
trans-unit.target: Como cada instância do <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>sempre contém o mesmo conjunto fixo de chaves, os valores de propriedade sempre retorna os valores correspondentes para o conjunto fixo de chaves, na mesma ordem que as chaves.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the values in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>que contém os valores de <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>
